summary: The client informed about an update to the prompt emphasizing record types. Mike acknowledged the update, explained its implications for sprint planning, and reaffirmed the proposal for sprint SP-001 (US-010 + US-015 + US-001), seeking approval.

sign_offs.what: Acknowledged prompt update and reaffirmed SP-001 proposal

actions.task: Review and approve or refine SP-001 sprint proposal

backlog_deltas.title: Proposed sprint including US-010, US-015, US-001
